verses.verse: So they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and set <S%H3322><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had pitched <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for it: and they offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> burnt sacrifices <S%H5930><s%> and peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And when David <S%H1732><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of offering <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and the peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, he blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And he dealt <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to every one <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, both man <S%H376><s%> and woman <S%H802><s%>, to every one <S%H376><s%> a hallah <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and a good piece of flesh <S%H829><s%>, and a flagon <S%H809><s%> of wine.

And he appointed <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> certain of the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8764><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and to record <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and to thank <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> and praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>:

Asaph <S%H623><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%>, and next <S%H4932><s%> to him Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%>, Jeiel <S%H3273><s%>, and Shemiramoth <S%H8070><s%>, and Jehiel <S%H3171><s%>, and Mattithiah <S%H4993><s%>, and Eliab <S%H446><s%>, and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%>, and `Ovededom <S%H5654><s%>: and Jeiel <S%H3273><s%> with psalteries <S%H5035><s%> <S%H3627><s%> and with harps <S%H3658><s%>; but Asaph <S%H623><s%> made a sound <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8688><s%> with cymbals <S%H4700><s%>;

Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> also and YAHaziel <S%H3166><s%> the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> with shofars <S%H2689><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Then on that day <S%H3117><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> first <S%H7218><s%> this psalm to thank <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon his name <S%H8034><s%>, make known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8685><s%> his deeds <S%H5949><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto him, sing psalms <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto him, talk <S%H7878><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye of all his wondrous <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> works.

Glory <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8690><s%> ye in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>: let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of them rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> and his strength <S%H5797><s%>, seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8761><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> his marvellous <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> works that he hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, his wonders <S%H4159><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>;
O ye seed <S%H2233><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>, ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, his chosen ones <S%H972><s%>.
He is the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; his judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Be ye mindful <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> always <S%H5769><s%> of his covenant <S%H1285><s%>; the word <S%H1697><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>;
Havahn of the covenant which he made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with Avraham <S%H85><s%>, and of his oath <S%H7621><s%> unto Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>;
And hath confirmed <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the same to Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> for a Torah <S%H2706><s%>, and to Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>,
Saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Unto thee will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, the lot <S%H2256><s%> of your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>;
When ye were but few <S%H4557><s%> <S%H4962><s%>, even a few <S%H4592><s%>, and strangers <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in it.
And when they went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> from nation <S%H1471><s%> to nation <S%H1471><s%>, and from one kingdom <S%H4467><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>;
He suffered <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8689><s%> no man <S%H376><s%> to do them wrong <S%H6231><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: yea, he reproved <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8686><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> for their sakes,
Saying, Touch <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not mine anointed <S%H4899><s%>, and do my prophets <S%H5030><s%> no harm <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, all the earth <S%H776><s%>; shew forth <S%H1319><s%> <S%H8761><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> his salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
Declare <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8761><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>; his marvellous works <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%> among all nations <S%H5971><s%>.

For great <S%H1419><s%> is the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8794><s%>: he also is to be feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> above all 'elohim <S%H430><s%>.
For all the 'elohim <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> are idols <S%H457><s%>: but the YY <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
Glory <S%H1935><s%> and honour <S%H1926><s%> are in his presence <S%H6440><s%>; strength <S%H5797><s%> and gladness <S%H2304><s%> are in his place <S%H4725><s%>.

Give <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, ye kindreds <S%H4940><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, give <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and strength <S%H5797><s%>.

Give <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> due unto his name <S%H8034><s%>: bring <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8798><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him: worship <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8690><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> in the beauty <S%H1927><s%> of holiness <S%H6944><s%>.

Fear <S%H2342><s%> <S%H8798><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, all the earth <S%H776><s%>: the world <S%H8398><s%> also shall be stable <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, that it be not moved <S%H4131><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Let the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and let men say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> reigneth <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar <S%H7481><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the fulness <S%H4393><s%> thereof: let the fields <S%H7704><s%> rejoice <S%H5970><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and all that is therein.

Then shall the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the wood <S%H3293><s%> sing out <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8762><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, because he cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for he is good <S%H2896><s%>; for his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye, Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8685><s%> us, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of our salvation <S%H3468><s%>, and gather us together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8761><s%>, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8685><s%> us from the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, that we may give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to thy holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, and glory <S%H7623><s%> <S%H8692><s%> in thy praise <S%H8416><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>, and praised <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

So he left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> Asaph <S%H623><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, as every day's <S%H3117><s%> work <S%H1697><s%> required <S%H3117><s%>:

And `Ovededom <S%H5654><s%> with their brethren <S%H251><s%>, threescore <S%H8346><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>; `Ovededom <S%H5654><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> and Hosah <S%H2621><s%> to be porters <S%H7778><s%>:

And Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> in the high place <S%H1116><s%> that was at Giv`on <S%H1391><s%>,

To offer <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> and evening <S%H6153><s%>, and to do according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>;

And with them Heman <S%H1968><s%> and Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>, and the rest <S%H7605><s%> that were chosen <S%H1305><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, who were expressed <S%H5344><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>, to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>, because his mercy <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>;

And with them Heman <S%H1968><s%> and Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> with shofars <S%H2689><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%> for those that should make a sound <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, and with musical <S%H7892><s%> instruments <S%H3627><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> were porters <S%H8179><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> returned <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%>.
